meta.title: Richard | Chief of Staff, Lunar Digital Assets & BitAngels Host
meta.description: Discover Richard’s work powering BitAngels, the premier investor network connecting blockchain founders, investors, and partners worldwide.

hero.name: Richard
hero.title: Chief of Staff, Lunar Digital Assets & Global Host, BitAngels
hero.tagline: Curating missionary founders and global investors to accelerate blockchain adoption.

about.summary: Richard bridges Lunar Digital Assets’ venture studio excellence with BitAngels’ global investor community, spotlighting founders who build for impact.

origin_story.headline: From venture studio to global stage.
origin_story.copy: At Lunar Digital Assets, Richard helped incubate unicorns like Polygon, QuickSwap, Persistence, and Comdex—experience he now channels into curating standout Web3 founders.

inflection_point.headline: Hosting the premier blockchain investor network.
inflection_point.copy: Coordinating BitAngels events worldwide, Richard elevated pitch competitions focused on political, legal, and regulatory discipline over hype.

mission.headline: Accelerate blockchain adoption through disciplined founders and aligned capital.

pillars.title: Missionary Founders
pillars.description: Champion teams who embody their product, execute relentlessly, and build for impact—not just exits.

pillars.title: Global Connectivity
pillars.description: Link investors, entrepreneurs, and partners across key cities and online channels for continuous collaboration.

pillars.title: Regulatory Readiness
pillars.description: Prioritize startups that understand the political, legal, and compliance fulcrum where Web3 ventures live or die.

project.name: BitAngels
project.problem: Web3 founders struggle to access experienced investors and structured feedback outside hype-driven events.
project.solution: BitAngels convenes disciplined investors, missionary founders, and service partners through curated pitch events, global meetups, and a collaborative membership platform.
value_proposition: Connect with blockchain veterans who have supported unicorn-scale ventures.
Gain insider access to vetted deal flow across global chapters and virtual events.
Collaborate with a community focused on compliance, security, and long-term impact.

experience.headline: BitAngels: the world’s premier investor network for the blockchain industry.
copy: Pitch alongside entrepreneurs, investors, partners, and enthusiasts across flagship events and weekly BitAngels X Spaces.
Explore the BitAngels network via city chapters, exclusive membership communications, and the Tokenize Global partnership.
Founders, investors, and service providers share insights, opportunities, and deal flow from different markets to accelerate adoption.

features: Monthly pitch events in key cities worldwide
Virtual programming including BitAngels X Space and Tokenize! Conference
Global membership platform with curated deal flow updates
Partnership ecosystem across blockchain media and venture networks

traction.global_network: Chapters spanning the United States, Korea, Singapore, London, France, Argentina, and more under active discussion.
traction.historic_leadership: Founded by Michael Terpin and David Johnston in 2013—the first and longest-running angel network for digital currency startups.

call_to_action.headline: Ready to plug into the BitAngels ecosystem?

highlights: Richard coordinates BitAngels’ global event footprint, from Phoenix pitch competitions to international chapters.
Guides founders with a focus on regulatory clarity, security infrastructure, and mission-driven execution.
Supports Lunar Digital Assets’ portfolio, including LitVM, Matterfly, American Fortress, and emerging bets.
Maintains relationships with blockchain pioneers like Michael Terpin and David Chaum to keep the network on the bleeding edge.

quotes.speaker: Richard
quotes.text: We’re always out on the look for various projects that are great to invest in and to work with as well.

quotes.speaker: Richard
quotes.text: We’re the very first angel network and pitch competition that has ever been created for Web3 specifically.

quotes.speaker: Richard
quotes.text: Not only are we the longest running, but we also have the godfather involved.

quotes.speaker: Richard
quotes.text: You see a founder who embodies his product... there’s a difference between a missionary and a mercenary.

quotes.speaker: Richard
quotes.text: Money is just a byproduct of you building something that’s going to be impactful.

timeline.event: BitAngels founded by Michael Terpin and David Johnston as the first digital currency angel network.
Lunar Digital Assets incubates Polygon, QuickSwap, Persistence, Comdex, and additional unicorn-scale projects.
BitAngels establishes chapters across North America, Europe, and Asia with events in cities like Phoenix, Singapore, London, and Buenos Aires.
Launches initiatives around quantum-resistant wallets, security infrastructure plays, and regulatory-informed programming.

supporters.name: Michael Terpin
supporters.relation: Founder of BitAngels and mentor within the network.
supporters.highlight: Coined the godfather of crypto by CNBC; leads Transform Ventures.

supporters.name: David Chaum
supporters.highlight: Demonstrated quantum-resistant Bitcoin wallets within the network.
